## Description {#details}

Base class of cleanup handler that controls recovery of resources of the given type.

<ParametersList title="Template Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="Derived">Class that uses this class as a base.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="T"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> of controlled resource.</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>
This class serves as a base for its template parameter as implied by Curiously Recurring Template <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pattern">Pattern</a>.

This class factors out creation of a cleanup handler. The latter requires knowledge of the current recovery context, which is provided by this class.

Definition at line 160 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/crashrecoverycontext-h">CrashRecoveryContext.h</a>.

<ParametersList title="Parameters">

<SectionUser title="Returns">
